CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 19, 1946, pg. 14, reads: "Lone Negro Exhibits at Institute - 'The Sea of Time' (bottom) entry of Eldzier Cortor, Chicago painter, is attracting favorable attention from visitors to the Carnegie Institute Exhibition.... THe exhibit, 'Painting in United States,' is open daily from 10 A. M. to 10 P. M., and will continue until Dec. 8.  It is free to the public. - Harris photos."
TitMainTitle: Figurative painting, "The Sea of Time" by Eldzier Cortor, in exhibition "Painting in the United States," Carnegie Institute
